Class AzureKeyVaultSigningService

java.lang.Object

public class AzureKeyVaultSigningService extends Object implements SigningService
Signing service using the Azure KeyVault API.

    • AzureKeyVaultSigningService

      public AzureKeyVaultSigningService(String vault, String token)
      Creates a new Azure Key Vault signing service.
      Parameters:
      vault - the name of the key vault, either the short name (e.g. myvault), or the full URL (e.g. ...).
      token - the Azure API access token
